title: Akali Login Theme - Slow and Chill Piano | League of Legends

embed.description: Hey, Welcome to chillOwlPiano. ðŸŽ§ This is a slow and chill piano improv of the new 'Akali Main Theme' by League of Legends. I hope you enjoy.

body: Hey, this is a piano cover of Akali's theme, I hope you enjoy it.

replies.body: Cool vibe, I really enjoyed your interpretation of her theme. Great work! {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}

This is really good! Did you play this yourself? Major props to you if you did!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
